title: Tennyson: Selected Poetry
description: Alfred, Lord Tennyson is among the most beloved English poets of all time. This edition of his selected poems includes classics like: - " The Lady of Shalott" - " Charge of the Light Brigade" - " Maud" - " Morte d'Arthur" - " Ulysses" - " The Lotus Eaters" Elegantly packaged with a ribbon marker, this volume is the perfect addition to any poetry library.
author: Alfred Tennyson
